Lonely Road #54, RT’s back on Thanksgiving, Nov. 27, 2008

Posted on June 1, 2012 by mike

Reagan T is an amazing woman. I had the pleasure of dating this spectacular woman during a portion of the shooting of my Lonely Roads book and she also turned out to be one of my best models. Divorced mother of 2 who’s now, since, remarried and had her 3rd child…she’s just fun & beautiful & spontaneous and was a complete pleasure to photograph and be around. And Ms. Spontaneous totally lived up to her name on Thanksgiving day in 2008!

Being the true traditionalists, she and I blew off the turkey and stuffing, took turkey sandwiches instead with us in the car, drove up I-17 North of Phoenix towards Crown King and the Prescott cutoff, and went looking for some Lonely Roads. We found a wonderful railing and road at the Bumble Bee exit and then went up to the Dumas/Orme exit past Hwy 69 and found this cool vista where we shot her jumping in the mesh scarf which you’ll find in my book.

But, LOL, you get interesting driver reactions when they stumble upon scantily-clad lovelies dancing around on Holidays. Hah, it was a game to catch the sexy peek of her rump sitting over the railing while drivers passed completely unaware. And, it wasn’t the warmest conditions that day….so, you’ve got to offer congrats to the gal who can sit bare-assed on chilly metal! Man, being her boyfriend @ the time I had to rub it a bunch to keep it warm, I’m sure. Hey, sometimes you just gotta do what you gotta do! 🙂

Well, checkout this amazing and stunning gal jumping and sitting and twisting and just being her killer self on the Lonely Road! And…..keep your fingers crossed that she shows up again in Lonely Roads #2. 🙂
